description:
Get grade and distance details or your hangtime after that last tabletop. The Edge 130 Plus gives you GPS-based data, barometric altimeter-based ascent and descent info, and navigation through preloaded courses. Connect to multiple satellite constellations for fast, strong GPS signals. Paired with Garmin Connect™ on your phone, you can review activities, plan courses, set up live tracking sessions, receive notifications, or access training apps. Pairs with a range of optional sensors to help you train even smarter.

  • LiveTrack shares courses with your contacts
  • Strava Segment integration (requires premium) preloaded or on-the-fly through your phone, shows starred segments and instantaneous results as segments end
  • ClimbPro™ reveals grades, total ascent, remaining ascent and elevation profile
  • Mountain biking dynamics include, jumps: number of jumps, hangtime, distance and speed, grit: overall trail difficulty, and flow: a score of how smoothly you rode the trail
  • Connects to GPS, GLONASS and Galileo satellite constellations for fast, strong GPS signals
  • 5 customizable pages, with up to 8 data fields per page
  • Connect IQ downloads configurable data like GU Fuel Reminder and Strava Suffer Score
  • Extended display mode pairs compatible Fenix or Forerunner devices
  • Navigate courses from Garmin Connect Mobile or Strava
  • Breadcrumb trail navigation lets you ride back the way you came or to a saved location (as the crow flies – no maps for routing)
  • Smart phone notifications (emails, texts, alerts and more) via Bluetooth
  • Automatically syncs data on phones running Garmin Connect
  • Connects with ANT+ and Bluetooth Smart sensors: heart-rate belts, speed and cadence pods, and power meters
  • ANT+/FEC smart trainer supports structured workouts controlled by your Edge
  • Incident detection detects accidents and signals predefined emergency contacts through your phone
  • Emergency assistance mode triggers alerts via phone and sends location and help request to selected contacts
  • Barometric altimeter tracks ascents, descents and total elevation change
  • Memory stores up to 100 hours of activities, 30 courses and up to 100 locations. Garmin Connect stores all your activity data
  • Intuitive 5-button interface works in any weather
  • Imports activity profiles, custom screens and all sensors used in the past year from previous Edge models
  • In the box: Edge 130 Plus, standard mount, tether, charging cable and documentation
name: Garmin Edge 130 Plus - Unisex
